data.actual_result: You are being taken to the message that was send with the user list still open which is now blank without users in it
data.expected_result: The user list would quit and the message would show
data.short_description: Clicking on a message notification that comes from a direct message when the user list is open, it keeps the user list open with no users in it
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure that your in app message notifications are enabled in the settings - Go into a random server where you are in - Go into a random channel in the server where you are in - Open the user list - Receive a direct message - Click on the received message notification
